system.description:
You summon a violent storm that affects an area around you out to one mile for the duration.

The storm brings darkened skies, severe wind, and driving rain.

For the duration of the spell, you can cast control water (Shadowdark RPG pg. 57), even if you do not know the spell.

For the duration of the spell, you can cast lightning bolt (Shadowdark RPG pg. 64), even if you do not know the spell.
